sentences.sContent: We offer a monthly stipend plus a travel allowance.
sentences.sContent_eng: We offer a monthly stipend plus a travel allowance.
sentences.sCn: 我们提供每月的薪水，外加旅游津贴。

synos.tran: 奖学金；固定薪金；定期津贴；养老金

remMethod.val: stip(点) + end(结束) → 在月末点结算 → 薪水

trans.tranOther: an amount of money paid regularly to someone, especially a priest, as a salary or as money to live on
